metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29950 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: Thunderbird unprotects a secret OpenPGP key prior to using it for adecryption, signing or key import task. If the task runs into a failure,the secret key may remain in memory in its unprotected state. Thisvulnerability affects Thunderbird < 78.8.1.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
